staff.name: John Doe
staff.description: John has been serving for 12 years as the lead pastor and main preacher.  He has a wife and 3 children.

staff.name: Josh Smith
staff.description: Josh has been serving as a part-time elder since 2012.  He 2 children and has been married to his wife for 8 years.

services.serviceDescription: All services are held at our church’s address.  The services at our church generally last between one and one and a half hours. The services are marked by a high view of God expressed in serious and joyful God-centered worship. We have simple services in which each aspect is rooted in scriptural commands. We engage in scripture reading, the congregational singing of psalms, hymns, and spiritual songs, prayer and the expository preaching of God’s word.

serviceTimes.title: Adult Sunday School
serviceTimes.description: Ages 13 and up meet in the main sanctuary.

serviceTimes.title: Childrens Sunday School
serviceTimes.description: We have classes for children ages 5 - 12 and nursery for those younger. When you arrive, take a right at after entering the main entrance and all of the classrooms will be down that hall.

beliefs.sectionText: The Scriptures of the Old and New Testament were given by inspiration of God, and are the only sufficient, certain and authoritative rule of all saving knowledge, faith and obedience.

There is but one God, the Maker, Preserver and Ruler of all things, having in and of himself, all perfections, and being infinite in them all; and to Him all creatures owe the highest love, reverence and obedience.
God is revealed to us as Father, Son and Holy Spirit each with distinct personal attributes, but without division of nature, essence or being.

notifications.description: There will be no services this week (the 12th) due to the snow storm.  Please tune into our live stream.
Due to Covid-19, sunday school has been canceled.  Please wear a mask if you are able.

ministries.name: Jail
ministries.description: Every other Saturday, we bring the word to the local jail. If you would like morei information, please talk to one of the deacons.

ministries.name: Pro-life Ministry
ministries.description: The church as a whole is very involved with the womans shelter downtown.  We are involved in various aspects. If you would like more information, please talk to one of the deacons.
